title: Fragment, 1901–50
medium:
Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation with supplementary warps (velvet).  At top, wire over which loops were formed is still in place.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 53 x 75 cm (20 7/8 x 29 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Example with pile design in grey of cut and uncut loops in a diamond lattice.
